SummaryEnglish: Fido, ran into an animal city, where he met Barkley and other humans like animal friends. Fido accidentally finds out that the animal city is governed by a magician known as "God" who pretends to have infinite supernatural powers. Using dazzling tricks, the "God" convinced all animal to worship him unquestionably. Fido and Barkley are determined to expose "God" for what he truly is , a fraud and find their way home.
